scripts.prismainit: npx prisma migrate diff --from-empty --to-schema-datamodel prisma/schema.prisma --script > prisma/migrations/init/migration.sql && npx prisma migrate resolve --applied init
scripts.prismareset: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');['public/files/tasks','public/images/tasks','public/images/clients','public/images/users'].forEach(d=>{if(fs.existsSync(d)){for(const f of fs.readdirSync(d)){if(!['.gitkeep','index.html'].includes(f)){fs.rmSync(p.join(d,f),{recursive:true,force:true});}}}});console.log('âœ” Cleared folders except .gitkeep and index.html');" && rimraf prisma/migrations && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('prisma/migrations',{recursive:true})" && (npx prisma migrate reset --force || echo 'reset failed') && (npx prisma migrate dev --skip-generate || echo 'migrate dev failed') && (npx prisma generate || echo 'generate failed') && (npx prisma db seed || echo 'seed failed')
scripts.prismaresetonly: rimraf prisma/migrations && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('prisma/migrations', { recursive: true })" && (npx prisma migrate reset --force || echo 'reset failed') && (npx prisma migrate dev --skip-generate || echo 'migrate dev failed') && (npx prisma generate || echo 'generate failed') && (npx prisma db seed || echo 'seed failed')
